bibl.title: The Roman Military Feriale.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: HThR 47 (1954) pp. 183-196. P. Dura 54 (= C.P.L. 324; Roman Mil. Rec. 117). Discusses the purpose of the military Feriale, considers the distribution of the occasions in the Feriale and examines three sections of the text (col. I, 7-9; 17-18; col. II, 26-28).

bibl.title: James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers

bibl.seg: Gilliam James Frank, The Roman Military Feriale.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers = Mavors Roman Army Researches. 2 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 123-136; - 443.

Reproduit de: HThR 47 (1954) pp. 183-196. P. Dura 54 (= C.P.L. 324; Roman Mil. Rec. 117). Discusses the purpose of the military Feriale, considers the distribution of the occasions in the Feriale and examines three sections of the text (col. I, 7-9; 17-18; col. II, 26-28).
